body.name: 2 Pack Honey Bear Straw Cups with 4 Flexible Straws & Cleaning Tools(2 Straw Brushes &1 Bottle Brush), 8-Ounce Therapy Sippy Bottles for Speech and Feeding Training, Leak-Proof & Food-Grade & BPA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 17 mins
features: ◆PACKAGE INCLUDE - 2 bottles + 4 replacement silicone straws + 2 straw brushes + 1 bottle brush, 8oz = 1cup = 235ml, SIZE: 5.6 x 2.2 inches , LEAK-PROOF bottle cup, FOOD-GRADE bottle and lids, BPA-FREE latex free medical grade silicone straws

◆INTENDED USES - Premium feeding and drinking therapy tool for individuals with Down Syndrome, Dysphagia and other special needs/abilities. Teach and help transition to straw drinking, tongue training, lip rounding, tongue retraction, and other oral motor skills, also ideal tool to wean a child from bottles and sippy cups.
◆EASY TO CLEAN - Due to special uses, they are not dishwasher safe or microwave safe. It's easy to clean straws with straw brushes and bottles with multifunctional sponge brush

◆LEAKPROOF BOTTLES - The bottle cap hole contacts with the straw closely, as the diameter of the hole and straw are the just right same size. It's handy to remove and insert without leakage even if inverted
◆If you have any issue with our products, please contact us, we will do our best to find a satisfactory solution for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for straw training
reviews.reviewText: Our second born was having trouble with straw cups and I was at a loss. Heard about the “honey bear” style and these were perfect. She was a pro in a week. They are not leak proof. She did toss them a lot off her high chair and the flip portion of the lid snapped on one. But the cups, straws, and straw brushes are amazing. I use the skinny brush it came with for our other straws/bottle parts etc because it’s so great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great straw starter cup
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this item to all of my friends that have babies transitioning to a straw cup. These cups allow you to squeeze while using, which can help aid babies get the liquid up the straw. They are easy to clean if you have a good straw brush. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for practicing using a straw
reviews.reviewText: This a great product for babies just learning to sip from a straw. They can hold it easily and I feel like the straw is easier to sip from compared to other “more advanced” sippys. This sippy is good for beginners and for practice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helped me daughter learn to use a straw, that’s mostly it
reviews.reviewText: Cute product and definitely helped my daughter learn how to use a straw. But the lid comes off easily and liquids will spill everywhere so not really a great product for anywhere but home with supervision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is exclusively breastfed and doesn’t take a bottle. I tried straw cups and he’d just chew on the straw like he does with bottles. He’s about to be 1 and after months of trying with no luck he finally got it after only two days using this honey bear cup!!! I should say one day because by day 2 he was already using it normally. Now he can use any straw cup no problem. So much off my shoulders now that I know he can drink milk out of a straw cup once he turns one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love these cups, hate the missing lids.
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my son because I’ve previously purchased and he loves them.I got them yesterday and they’re missing the lids. I thought maybe mom brain made me misplace them but that’s not the case, I’ve searched all over and no sign of them. I would be satisfied if they just sent me some lids lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT ASAP
reviews.reviewText: My child absolutely would not use a straw. After daily practice with probably 10+ different kinds of straw cup, we felt defeated. Finally someone recommended this cup to us and my daughter had it figured out in a day. We are now happily using a regular straw cup. My only complaint is that she figured it out so fast that we didn’t need it long!! Worth every penny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 8 month old can drink out of a straw!
reviews.reviewText: Yes you read that right my 8 month old and drink out of a straw because of this cup. We decided not to do a sippy for many reasons so went straight to a straw and this Bear is awesome, I would recommend to every Mom!

reviews.reviewTitle: Funciona muy bien, la calidad podría mejorar
reviews.reviewText: A mi bebe le encanta tomar agua del osito.Le quite dos estrellas a la reseña por que con 1 mes de uso ya se le despintaron los ojos y una tapa se rompió.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product, baby had very severe tongue tie, poor suck and swallow reflexes and oral aversion. I had been dreading the day I had to teach her how to drink water from a straw. It took a few days, but the gentle squeezing of the bottle really helped! This product 100% helped her to learn what to do and made the whole experience a million times easier

reviews.reviewTitle: Ok products not sure if its worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good product feature to let baby drink water and come with washing items. But the price a bit expensive... Serve it purposes i think

Package were slightly dented/damaged and items within did not seem to be clean / brand new. The worst part was that the bottle brush and straw brushes were missing, unlike the product description. Very disappointed with the purchase.
